Normalize predictions to 100% to fix problems
```{r}
terraOptions(memfrac=0.9, progress=2)
divide_by_sum <- function(vector) {
  # no values sum to 0 (and few that sum to exactly 100), but this is how a check could be incorporated
  #if (sum(vector) == 0) {
    #stop("Sum of the vector is zero. Division by zero is not allowed.")
  #}
  v = vector / sum(vector)*100
  return(round(v, 0))
}

app(ssc0, divide_by_sum, cores=30, filename= "/mnt/disks/sped/ssc_sum/sum0_fix.tif", overwrite=TRUE, wopt=list(datatype='INT1U', names = c('sand', 'silt', 'clay')))
app(ssc5, divide_by_sum, cores=30, filename= "/mnt/disks/sped/ssc_sum/sum5_fix.tif", overwrite=TRUE, wopt=list(datatype='INT1U', names = c('sand', 'silt', 'clay')))
```
